dialogues.text: A lot of people have been giving me weird looks because of the haircut you gave me. It makes me nervous.
People at work and also on the street. But something else happened. Someone said it looked cool!
I'm split. It was not the right thing to do, we have a collective responsability. Yet someone give me a compliment about my hair!

responses.text: You can occasionally break the rules.

dialogues.text: It felt pretty amazing! I kept feeling like that for the rest of the day as well! But does it outweigh the bad comments?
Thanks! You know what you're doing, you're a proffesional. But I also don't want to get in any kind of trouble.
It felt pretty amazing! I kept feeling like that for the rest of the day as well! But I don't want to get in trouble.
That is how the system falls apart! But then again, does hair really make a big difference? Getting compliments feels amazing.
